mapper.insert: insert into mst_device (device_no, maker, os, memory, capacity, graphic_board, storage_locate, broken, lease_flag, lease_start_date, lease_deadline_date, lease_employee_no, remarks, inventory_date, register_date, update_date, delete_flag) values (#{device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graphic_board,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storage_locate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{broken,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lease_flag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lease_start_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lease_deadline_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lease_employee_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{register_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{update_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delete_flag,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update mst_device
device_no = #{row.device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maker = #{row.maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
os = #{row.os,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memory = #{row.memory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
capacity = #{row.capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
graphic_board = #{row.graphic_board,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storage_locate = #{row.storage_locate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
broken = #{row.broken,jdbcType=BIT},
lease_flag = #{row.lease_flag,jdbcType=BIT},
lease_start_date = #{row.lease_start_date,jdbcType=DATE},
lease_deadline_date = #{row.lease_deadline_date,jdbcType=DATE},
lease_employee_no = #{row.lease_employee_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{row.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inventory_date = #{row.inventory_date,jdbcType=DATE},
register_date = #{row.register_date,jdbcType=DATE},
update_date = #{row.update_date,jdbcType=DATE},
delete_flag = #{row.delete_flag,jdbcType=BIT},

update mst_device set device_no = #{row.device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maker = #{row.maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, os = #{row.os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memory = #{row.memory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capacity = #{row.capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graphic_board = #{row.graphic_board,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_locate = #{row.storage_locate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, broken = #{row.broken,jdbcType=BIT}, lease_flag = #{row.lease_flag,jdbcType=BIT}, lease_start_date = #{row.lease_start_date,jdbcType=DATE}, lease_deadline_date = #{row.lease_deadline_date,jdbcType=DATE}, lease_employee_no = #{row.lease_employee_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{row.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_date = #{row.inventory_date,jdbcType=DATE}, register_date = #{row.register_date,jdbcType=DATE}, update_date = #{row.update_date,jdbcType=DATE}, delete_flag = #{row.delete_flag,jdbcType=BIT}

update mst_device
maker = #{maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
os = #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memory = #{memory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
capacity = #{capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
graphic_board = #{graphic_board,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storage_locate = #{storage_locate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
broken = #{broken,jdbcType=BIT},
lease_flag = #{lease_flag,jdbcType=BIT},
lease_start_date = #{lease_start_date,jdbcType=DATE},
lease_deadline_date = #{lease_deadline_date,jdbcType=DATE},
lease_employee_no = #{lease_employee_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inventory_date = #{inventory_date,jdbcType=DATE},
register_date = #{register_date,jdbcType=DATE},
update_date = #{update_date,jdbcType=DATE},
delete_flag = #{delete_flag,jdbcType=BIT},
where device_no = #{device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update mst_device set maker = #{maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, os = #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memory = #{memory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capacity = #{capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graphic_board = #{graphic_board,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_locate = #{storage_locate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, broken = #{broken,jdbcType=BIT}, lease_flag = #{lease_flag,jdbcType=BIT}, lease_start_date = #{lease_start_date,jdbcType=DATE}, lease_deadline_date = #{lease_deadline_date,jdbcType=DATE}, lease_employee_no = #{lease_employee_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_date = #{inventory_date,jdbcType=DATE}, register_date = #{register_date,jdbcType=DATE}, update_date = #{update_date,jdbcType=DATE}, delete_flag = #{delete_flag,jdbcType=BIT} where device_no = #{device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT device_no, maker, os, memory, storage_locate, broken, lease_flag, lease_start_date, lease_deadline_date FROM MST_DEVICE WHERE delete_flag = false ORDER BY device_no ASC

SELECT MST_DEVICE.device_no, MST_DEVICE.lease_flag, MST_DEVICE.lease_start_date, MST_DEVICE.lease_deadline_date, MST_DEVICE.lease_employee_no, MST_DEVICE.inventory_date, MST_DEVICE.remarks, MST_USER.name FROM MST_USER RIGHT JOIN MST_DEVICE ON MST_DEVICE.lease_employee_no = MST_USER.employee_no WHERE MST_DEVICE.delete_flag = false AND MST_DEVICE.broken = false ORDER BY device_no ASC

SELECT MST_DEVICE.device_no, MST_DEVICE.lease_flag, MST_DEVICE.lease_start_date, MST_DEVICE.lease_deadline_date, MST_DEVICE.lease_employee_no, MST_DEVICE.inventory_date, MST_DEVICE.remarks, MST_USER.name FROM MST_USER RIGHT JOIN MST_DEVICE ON MST_DEVICE.lease_employee_no = MST_USER.employee_no WHERE MST_DEVICE.delete_flag = false AND MST_DEVICE.broken = false AND MST_DEVICE.device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY device_no ASC

SELECT device_no, maker, os, memory, storage_locate, graphic_board, lease_flag, broken, lease_start_date, lease_deadline_date, lease_employee_no, inventory_date, remarks, register_date, update_date FROM MST_DEVICE WHERE device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND delete_flag = False
mapper.update: UPDATE MST_DEVICE SET maker = #{maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, os = #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memory = #{memory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capacity = #{capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graphic_board = #{graphic_board,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_locate = #{storage_locate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, broken = #{broken,jdbcType=BIT}, lease_flag = #{lease_flag,jdbcType=BIT}, lease_start_date = #{lease_start_date,jdbcType=DATE}, lease_deadline_date = #{lease_deadline_date,jdbcType=DATE}, lease_employee_no = #{lease_employee_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_date = #{inventory_date,jdbcType=DATE}, update_date = #{update_date,jdbcType=DATE} WHERE device_no = #{device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MST_DEVICE WHERE device_no = #{device_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
